text: Centrinaspis is a genus of true weevils in the subfamily Curculioninae. Species are found in the Americas. == References == * Observations on the corn stalk weevil Centrinaspis penicellus. VM Kirk - Journal of Economic Entomology, 1965 * Biology and control of Centrinaspis capillatus (LeC.) in redtop. WH Luckmann and CD Lesar, Journal of Economic Entomology, 1959 == External links == * * Centrinaspis at insectoid.info Category:Curculionidae genera Category:Curculioninae
title: Centrinaspis
